item.description:
To redeem my organizing "skills" from Tupelo; I've found a restaurant that will take reservations for a large group. And its Chicken dinner night on Sundays (plus they have great martinis)! Winner, winner...
Let's meet between 6:15 and 6:30; the reservation is for 6:30 and we'll be seated then.

http://metclubandbar....

SUNDAY TWâ€™s CHICKEN DINNER
$15.95 per person
Buttermilk Fried, Bar-B-Que
or Whole Roasted Chicken for Two
House Salad with Choice of Side:
French Fries, Sweet Potato Fries, Garlic Spinach,
Butter & Cream Mashed Potatoes,
Mac & Cheese or Malt Waffle

Parking can be a little crazy, but they do have valet. Keep your eyes open on Rte 9 East and you might find street parking.
item.how_to_find_us: My picture is in my profile and I'll be by the hostess area
item.name: Sunday night Chicken dinner--Metropolitan restaurant
